price: da opominješ narod čiji preci nisu bili opominjani, pa je ravnodušan!
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
